lead_paragraph: The bombing coincided with the end of a two-month cease-fire that P.K.K. had declared to clear the way for political talks in an effort to end its conflict with the Turkish government.
snippet: The bombing coincided with the end of a two-month cease-fire that P.K.K. had declared to clear the way for political talks in an effort to end its conflict with the Turkish government.

headline.main: Turkey: Separatist Group Denies Link to Bombing Causing Panic in Istanbul
headline.print_headline: Turkey: Separatist Group Denies Link To Bombing Causing Panic In Istanbul
